mapper.insert: insert into user( user_id, user_nickname, user_password, user_type, user_state, user_create_time, user_Phone_num )values( #{user_id}, #{user_nickname}, #{user_password}, #{user_type}, #{user_state}, #{user_create_time}, #{user_Phone_num} )
mapper.select: select user_id, user_nickname, user_password, user_type, user_state, user_create_time, user_update_time, user_Phone_num, user_lastlog_time, user_level, user_demo from user where user_nickname=#{name}

select user_id, user_nickname, user_password, user_type, user_state, user_create_time, user_update_time, user_Phone_num, user_lastlog_time, user_level, user_demo from user where user_Phone_num=#{phone}
mapper.update: update user set user_password = #{password} where user_Phone_num = #{phone}
mapper.select: select user_id, user_nickname, user_password, user_type, user_state, user_create_time, user_update_time, user_Phone_num, user_lastlog_time, user_level, user_demo from user where user_id=#{userId}
